name: Switcheroo Labs
description:
A physics puzzle game made for the Physics Jam, hosted by 8 Bits to Infinity, featuring 12 exciting levels.

You work at Switcheroo Labs, a company that pioneers in physics manipulation technology. To run your experiments, you set up a stage in a closed chamber with a ball, which needs to get to the goal. However, it won't get to it on its own at first--you need to switch out the current physics rules in the chamber with new rules, including changing the drag, mass, and even gravity.

Instructions are in the game
All art, music, etc. made by me

Have fun...
